John Stillwell/AFP/Getty Images Kate Middleton Visits Olympians Britain's Kate, Duchess of Cambridge, leaves after watching a women's hockey bronze medal match between Britain and New Zealand at the 2012 Summer Olympics, London, Aug. 10, 2012. Britain won the bronze medal. Jae C. Hong/AP Photo Kate Middleton Visits Olympians Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, center, talks to Team GB after their Women's Hockey bronze medal match against New Zealand on Day 14 of the London 2012 Olympic Games, Aug. 10, 2012 in London, England. Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Middleton Cheers on Brits Prince Harry and Kate Middleton, Duchess of Cambridge visit athletes at Team GB House in the Westfield Centre on Day 13 of the London 2012 Olympic Games on Aug. 9, 2012 in London, England. Middleton and Prince Harry visited met a number of athletes, including gold medal winning rower Sophie Hosking. John Stillwell/Getty Images Middleton Cheers on Team Britain's Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, applauds Britain's handball team at the end of the women's preliminary Group A handball match, Croatia vs, Great Britain, for the London 2012 Olympics Games on Aug. 5, 2012 at the Copper Box hall in London. Croatia won 37-14. Javier Soriano/AFP/Getty Images Kate Middleton Cheers on Olympic Cycling Team Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge applaud the gold medal victory by the Team GB Men's Team Pursuit in the Track Cycling on Aug. 3, 2012 in London, England. John Stillwell/Getty Images Kate Middleton Does the Wave Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge and Prince William, Duke of Cambridge embrace after Philip Hindes, Jason Kenny and Sir Chris Hoy of Great Britain win the gold and a new world record in the Men's Team Sprint Track Cycling final during Day 6 of the London 2012 Olympic Games at Velodrome, Aug. 2, 2012 in London. Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Kate Middleton Does The Wave Prince William and Kate, Duchess of Cambridge, join the crowd in doing the wave at a match at Wimbledon in London at the 2012 Summer Olympics, Thursday, August 2, 2012. AP Photo/Mark Humphrey Kate Middleton Cheers on Queen's Grandchild Kate Middleton arrives at the Royal Academy of Arts in London for the UK creative industries reception on July 30, 2012. Middleton looked ravishing in a gray dress designed by Roksanda Ilincic. The Duchess of Cambridge greeted British Prime Minister David Cameron as she attending an event to promote the U.K.'s GREAT Campaign. Geoff Pugh/AP Photo Middleton Greets Olympic Torch Kate Middleton and Prince William attend the Cross Country Phase of The Eventing at Greenwich Park, on the third day of the London 2012 Olympics. The Duchess of Cambridge wore a classic blue blazer and simple white shirt while she watched as the Queen's granddaughter Zara Phillips competed at the event. Owen Humphreys/PA Wire/Press Association Images Kate Middleton Cheers on Queen's Grandchild Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge attends the Eventing Cross Country Equestrian event of the London 2012 Olympic Games at Greenwich Park on July 30, 2012. Pascal Le Segretain/Getty Images Kate Middleton Greets Olympic Torch Prince William and his wife Kate, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince Harry are joined by children from the Team Britain Ambition Program as they watch Wai Ming hand over the London 2012 Olympic Torch to John Hulse during a visit to Buckingham Palace in London, on Day 69 of the London 2012 Olympic Torch Relay, July 26, 2012. Ian West /AP Photo Kate Middleton Greets Olympic Torch Torchbearer 170 passes the Olympic Flame to Torchbearer 171 in front of Buckingham Palace in the presence of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge and Prince Harry on the torch relay leg through Westminster, July 26, 2012, in London. The opening ceremonies for the 2012 Summer Olympics were scheduled Friday, July 27, 2012. Gareth Fuller/AP Photo Kate Watches Wimbledon Men's Final Match Kate Middleton visits The National Portait Gallery's "Road to 2012: Aiming High Exhibition," July 19, 2012 in London. The Duchess wore an electric blue Stella McCartney dress and an Olympic inspired necklace from her own wardrobe. Samir Hussein/WireImage/Getty Images Kate and Pippa Middleton at Wimbledon Kate, Duchess of Cambridge, right, speaks with her sister Pippa Middleton as they watch Roger Federer of Switzerland face Andy Murray of Britain during the men's final match at the All England Lawn Tennis Championships at Wimbledon, England, Sunday, July 8, 2012. Kate is reportedly wearing the Joseph Vanessa dress which she previously wore when she visited Canada with Prince William. Kirsty Wigglesworth/AP Photo Kate Middleton Goes Retro at Wimbledon The Duchess of Cambridge looked impeccable as always while joining the Queen and the Duke of Edinburgh for Prince William's Thistle Service. Middleton wore a pale yellow coat dress by Emilia Wickstead and carried a flash of Strathearn tartan in the shape of a folded scarf. Chris Jackson/Getty Images Kate Middleton Goes Retro at Wimbledon Kate Middleton and Prince William make their way to their seats in the Royal Box on Centre Court during Day 9 of the Wimbledon Lawn Tennis Championships at the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club. The duchess is wearing a pleated cable-knit dress by Alexander McQueen. Clive Rose/Getty Images Kate Middleton and Prince William Preserved in Wax Wax figures of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge are pictured wearing England supporters' hats, scarves and flags in support of England's participation in the Euro 2012, at Madame Tussauds, London, Friday, June 22, 2012. Jonathan Short/AP Photo Kate Middleton Radiant in White (L-R) Sophie Rhys-Jones, Countess of Wessex, Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge and Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall attend the annual Order of the Garter Service at St George's Chapel, Windsor Castle on June 18, 2011 in Windsor, England. The Order of the Garter is the senior and oldest British Order of Chivalry, founded by Edward III in 1348. Paul Edwards - WPA Pool/Getty Images Kate Middleton Atttends Polo Match Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge attends The Golden Metropolitan Polo Club Charity Cup polo match, in which Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Prince Harry played, at the Beaufort Polo Club on June 17, 2012 in Tetbury, England. Indigo/Getty Images Kate Middleton Goes Camping Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge interacts with schoolchildren at an 'Expanding Horizons' Primary School camp in Kent, on June 17, 2012 in Wrotham, England. David Parker/Getty Images Kate Middleton Goes Camping Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge participated in several outdoor activities at the Widehorizons Margaret McMillan House in Kent, on June 17, 2012 in Wrotham, England. David Parker/Getty Images Kate Middleton Tranquil in Pastels Kate Middleton wore a silver-gray Erdem dress to celebrate the Queen's official birthday. The Duchess of Cambridge rode in a horse drawn carriage to see the Trooping The Colour at the Horse Guards Parade in London, Saturday, June 16, 2012. Sang Tan/AP Photo Kate Middleton Bold in Blue Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge waves from the balcony of Council House in Nottingham, central England, June 13, 2012 during a visit. Middleton dazzled in a powder blue tweed M Missoni coat dress on the latest leg of the Queen's Diamond Jubilee tour. Rui Vieira/AFP/ Getty Images Kate, Dreamy in Dove Grey Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge attends the wedding of Emily McCorquodale and James Hutt at The Church of St. Andrew and St. Mary, Stoke Rochford on June 9, 2012 in Grantham, England. She wore a pale gray dress paired with her signature LK Bennett shoes to the nuptials of Princess Diana's niece and Prince William's cousin, Emily McCorquodale. Indigo/Getty Images Kate, Radiant in Red! Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge takes part in The Thames River Pageant, as part of the Diamond Jubilee, marking the 60th anniversary of the accession of Queen Elizabeth II on June 3, 2012 in London, England. Danny Martindale/WireImage/Getty Images Kate Pretty in Pink Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge meets guests during a garden party at Buckingham Palace on May 29, 2012 in London, England. She wore the same simple pleated dress for the Royals for the Queen's celebratory lunch at Windsor Castle two weeks ago. Anthony Devlin - WPA Pool /Getty Images Kate Pretty in Pink Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, Princess Royal and Prince Charles, Prince of Wales attend a garden party at Buckingham Palace on May 29, 2012 in London, England. Anthony Devlin - WPA Pool /Getty Images Kate Is Pretty in Pink Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge and Prince William, Duke of Cambridge during a reception in the Waterloo Chamber, before the Lunch For Sovereign Monarchs at Windsor Castle, on May 18, 2012 in Windsor, England. Arthur Edwards/WPA Pool/Getty Images Kate Dazzles Crowd with Teal Dress While her husband Prince William rode horseback at a charity polo match May 13, 2012, in Berkshire, England, Duchess of Cambridge Kate Middleton displayed her long athletic legs in a short sea-green dress and high-heeled wedge shoes. Almasi/Splash News Kate Middleton's Shimmers in Teal Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge attended at 'Our Greatest Team Rises -BOA Olympic Concert' at the Royal Albert Hall on May 11, 2012 in London, England. She wore a teal dress by one of her favorite designers, Jenny Packham. Chris Jackson/Getty Images Will, Kate Wax Figures Unveiled The Duchess of Cambridge dazzled crowds as she accompanied Price William on Monday night to a meeting of the Thirty Club, which consists of some of Britain's most powerful ad and media types, at the famed Claridge's hotel in London. Middleton wowed onlookers in a cream-colored gown, believed to be designed by Roland Mouret, which featured a bold slit straight up the middle. Splash News Will, Kate Wax Figures Unveiled Prince William, Duke of Cambridge and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge attend the UK Premiere of 'African Cats' in aid of Tusk Trust at BFI Southbank on April 25, 2012 in London, England. Mark Large/Getty Images Kate Middleton Celebrates St. Patrick's Day A guard faints during a St. Patrick's Day parade visit by Kate Middleton, duchess of Cambridge. ABC News Kate Middleton: A Princess in the Making Kate Middleton shopped for groceries in Anglesey, North West Wales May 5, 2011. "She loaded all the shopping into her car on her own, then skipped as she ran the trolley back to the park," an told the Daily Mail. ABC News

Article.title: Photos: This Week in Pictures
Article.Description: The latest news photos from around the globe.
Article.MainBody:
+
Performers wave Vietnamese national flags during a parade celebrating the 40th anniversary of the end of the Vietnam War which is also remembered as the "Fall of Saigon", in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, April 30, 2015. Dita Alangkara/AP Photo Performers wave Vietnamese national flags during a parade celebrating the 40th anniversary of the end of the Vietnam War which is also remembered as the "Fall of Saigon", in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, April 30, 2015. Dita Alangkara/AP Photo Royalist Terry Hutt and Margaret Tyler chat on Terry's 80th Birthday as he continues his wait for a new Royal baby at the Lindo wing, April 30, 2015, in London. Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge is expected to give birth at the Lindo wing sometime in the next couple of weeks. Chris Jackson/Getty Images Four-month-old baby boy Sonit Awal is held up by Nepalese Army soldiers after being rescued from the rubble of his house in Bhaktapur, Nepal, April 26, 2015, after the 7.8-magnitude earthquake shook the densely populated Kathmandu valley. Amul Thapa/KathmanduToday.com via AP Photo A protester is detained by New York police during a demonstration calling for social, economic and racial justice in New York City, April 29, 2015. The demonstration was being held to support Baltimore's protest against police brutality following the April 19 death of Freddie Gray in police custody. Andrew Kelly/Reuters Landon McKenzie, 7, walks with his father, Shawn and brother Joem during an open carry gun rally and march, April 29, 2015, in downtown Lansing, Mich. Danielle Duval/The Jackson Citizen Patriot via AP Photo A demonstrator wears glasses with dollar signs in Bujumbura, Burundi, April 29, 2015, as anti-government street demonstrations continue against President Pierre Nkurunziza. Some demonstrators are vowing not to leave the streets until the president, seeking a third term, withdraws his candidacy. Jerome Delay/AP Photo Destroyed villages sit on mountain tops near the epicenter of the massive earthquake in the Gorkha District of Nepal, April 29, 2015. Aid reached the hilly district for the first time Wednesday, four days after the quake struck. Wally Santana/AP Photo A victim with a broken leg from Saturday's massive earthquake, gives her details to Nepalese soldiers as she arrives by helicopter from the heavily-damaged Ranachour village at a landing zone in the town of Gorkha, Nepal, April 28, 2015. Wally Santana/AP Photo Boxer Manny Pacquiao, of the Philippines, holds his youngest child, Israel, as they arrive at the Delano Las Vegas hotel, April 27, 2015, in Las Vegas. Pacquiao is scheduled to fight Floyd Mayweather Jr. in a welterweight boxing match in Las Vegas on May 2. John Locher/AP Photo Inmates gather on the roof of the prison of the National Bolivarian Police during a riot in Caracas, Venezuela, April 27, 2015. Carlos Garcia Rawlins/Reuters A demonstrator jumps on a damaged police car during clashes in Baltimore, Md., April 27, 2015. Several Baltimore police officers were injured on Monday in violent clashes with young people after the funeral of Freddie Gray, who died in police custody earlier this month. Shannon Stapleton/Reuters A pangolin climbs out of a cage upon its release into the wild in Sibolangit, Indonesia, April 27, 2015. A police raid last week confiscated the anteater and dozens of live pangolins, along with five tons of pangolin meat, ready to be shipped abroad. Binsar Bakkara/AP Photo Classic dancers perform on the street during Dance Day in Pamplona, Spain, April 25, 2015. Alvaro Barrientos/AP Photo Damaged buildings lean to their sides in Kathmandu, Nepal, April 27, 2015. A strong 7.8 magnitude earthquake shook Nepal's capital and the densely populated Kathmandu Valley on Saturday causing extensive damage, which toppled walls and collapsed buildings. Wally Santana/AP Photo Nineteen new priests lay on the ground during a ceremony in which Pope Francis ordained them in St. Peter's Basilica at the Vatican, April 26, 2015. Giorgio Onorati/AP Photo Mourners comfort one another during the funeral for Freddie Gray at the New Shiloh Baptist Church during his funeral, April 27, 2015, in Baltimore. According to his attorney, Gray died a week after being arrested for carrying a switchblade, in the hospital from a severe spinal cord injury he received while in police custody. Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images A rebel fighter rides a motorbike along a road in Qarmeed camp, April 27, 2015, in Syria. A coalition of Islamist rebels seized the army base in northwestern Syria which brought the coalition closer to seizing most of the Idlib province and moving toward Latakia, the ancestral home of President Bashar al-Assad. Abdalghne Karoof/Reuters Former British police officer Swasie Turner abseils for charity down the fortification bastions of Valletta, Malta, April 27, 2015. Turner has wheeled himself more than 38,000 miles and raised over 1 million pounds for charity since 1997 after losing his wife to cancer, and came months after he was confined to a wheelchair when he was deliberately run down by a motorcycle while on duty as a police officer. Darrin Zammit/Reuters
